Articles.Content: Whenever I try to install some mods with CKAN between 20% and 50% It comes up with an error saying something along the lines of "System.Transactions.TransactionException: Failed to roll back. -->System.IO.IOException: The process cannot access the file 'C:\Users\user\AppData\Local\Temp\CdFileMgr\58abaf0b-f4f0-46.tpm' because it is being used by another process. at System.IO._Error.WinIOError(Int32 errorCode, String maybe FullPath)" I'm on Windows and it usually happens when installing Real Solar System.

I'd recommend going straight for ye olde manual install. This is why I never use any of those automated tools. If manual installation fails, then something is seriously wrong on your end and we may not be able to help.
